ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.test.junit
Class TestClientsException

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.test.junit.TestClientsException
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestCyclicClientsException
public class TestClientsException
extends junit.framework.TestCase

This class provides a way for exception handling test in the scenario of one broker with swingRmiClient. In order to run this class, rmiregistry 1099 need to be done first.

Author:
Shuang Hou, Bala Maniymaran
